verses.verse: So <WG3779> let <WG3049> a man <WG444> think <WG3049> of us <WG2248> as <WG5613> Christ <WG5547>'s servants, <WG5257> and <WG2532> stewards <WG3623> of God <WG2316>'s mysteries. <WG3466>
Here, <WG3063> moreover, <WG3739> it is required <WG2212> of <WG1722> stewards, <WG3623> that <WG2443> they <WG5100> be found <WG2147> faithful. <WG4103>

But <WG1161> with me <WG1698> it <WG1519> is <WG2076> a very small thing <WG1646> that <WG2443> I should be judged <WG350> by <WG5259> you, <WG5216> or <WG2228> by <WG5259> man <WG442>'s judgment. <WG2250> Yes, <WG235> I don't <WG3761> judge <WG350> my own self. <WG1683>

For <WG1063> I know <WG4894> nothing <WG3762> against myself. <WG1683> Yet <WG235> I <WG1344> am not <WG3756> justified <WG1344> by <WG5129> this, <WG1722> but <WG1161> he <WG3588> who judges <WG350> me <WG3165> is <WG2076> the Lord. <WG2962>

Therefore <WG5620> judge <WG2919> <WG99999> nothing <WG3361> before <WG4253> <WG99999> the time, <WG2540> until <WG2193> the Lord <WG2962> comes, <WG2064> who <WG3739> will both <WG2532> bring to light <WG5461> the hidden things <WG2927> of darkness, <WG4655> and <WG2532> reveal <WG5319> the counsels <WG1012> of the hearts. <WG2588> <WG2532> Then <WG5119> each man <WG1538> will <WG1096> get <WG1096> his praise <WG1868> from <WG575> God. <WG2316>

Now <WG1161> these things, <WG5023> brothers, <WG80> I have in a figure transferred <WG3345> to <WG1519> myself <WG1683> and <WG2532> Apollos <WG625> for <WG1223> your sakes, <WG5209> that <WG2443> in <WG1722> us <WG2254> you might learn <WG3129> not <WG3361> to think <WG5426> beyond <WG5228> the things which <WG3739> are written, <WG1125> that <WG2443> none <WG3361> of you <WG1520> be puffed up <WG5448> <WG5228> against <WG2596> one <WG1520> another. <WG2087>

For <WG1063> who <WG5101> makes <WG1252> you <WG4571> different? <WG1161> And what <WG5101> do you <WG2192> have that <WG3739> you <WG2192> <WG2983> didn't <WG3756> receive? <WG2983> But <WG1161> if <WG1487> <WG2532> you did receive <WG2983> it, <WG5101> why do you boast <WG2744> as if <WG5613> you had <WG2983> not <WG3361> received it? <WG2983>

You are <WG2075> already <WG2235> filled. <WG2880> You have already <WG2235> become rich. <WG4147> You have come to reign <WG936> without <WG5565> us. <WG2257> Yes, <WG2532> and I wish <WG3785> that <WG1065> you did reign, <WG936> that <WG2443> we <WG2249> also <WG2532> might reign <WG4821> with you. <WG5213>

For, <WG1063> I think <WG1380> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> has displayed <WG584> us, <WG2248> the apostles, <WG652> last <WG2078> of all, <WG5613> like men sentenced to death. <WG1935> For <WG3754> we are made <WG1096> a spectacle <WG2302> to the world, <WG2889> both <WG2532> to angels <WG32> and <WG2532> men. <WG444>

We <WG2249> are fools <WG3474> for <WG1223> Christ <WG5547>'s sake, but <WG1161> you <WG5210> are wise <WG5429> in <WG1722> Christ. <WG5547> We <WG2249> are weak, <WG772> but <WG1161> you <WG5210> are strong. <WG2478> You <WG5210> have honor, <WG1741> but <WG1161> we <WG2249> have dishonor. <WG820>

Even to <WG891> this present <WG737> hour <WG5610> we <WG3983> <WG2532> hunger, <WG3983> <WG2532> thirst, <WG1372> <WG2532> are naked, <WG1130> <WG2532> are beaten, <WG2852> and <WG2532> have no certain dwelling place. <WG790>
<WG2532> We toil, <WG2872> working <WG2038> with our own <WG2398> hands. <WG5495> When people curse <WG3058> us, <WG2127> we bless. Being persecuted, <WG1377> we endure. <WG430>
Being defamed, <WG987> we entreat. <WG3870> We are made <WG1096> as <WG5613> the filth <WG4027> of the world, <WG2889> the dirt <WG4067> wiped off by all, <WG3956> even until <WG2193> now. <WG737>
I don't <WG3756> write <WG1125> these things <WG5023> to shame <WG1788> you, <WG5209> but <WG235> to admonish <WG3560> you as <WG5613> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> children. <WG5043>

For <WG1063> though <WG1437> you have <WG2192> ten thousand <WG3463> tutors <WG3807> in <WG1722> Christ, <WG5547> yet <WG235> not <WG3756> many <WG4183> fathers. <WG3962> For <WG1063> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424> I <WG1473> became your <WG5209> father <WG1080> through <WG1223> the Good News. <WG2098>
I beg <WG3870> you <WG5209> therefore, <WG3767> be <WG1096> imitators <WG3402> of me. <WG3450>

Because <WG1223> of this <WG5124> I have sent <WG3992> Timothy <WG5095> to you, <WG5213> who <WG3739> is <WG2076> my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> child <WG5043> in <WG1722> the Lord, <WG2962> who <WG3739> will <WG363> remind <WG363> you <WG5209> of my <WG3450> ways <WG3598> which are <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ, <WG5547> even as <WG2531> I teach <WG1321> everywhere <WG3837> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> assembly. <WG1577>
Now <WG1161> some <WG5100> are puffed up, <WG5448> as though <WG5613> I <WG3450> were <WG2064> not <WG3361> coming <WG2064> to <WG4314> you. <WG5209>

But <WG1161> I will come <WG2064> to <WG4314> you <WG5209> shortly, <WG5030> if <WG1437> the Lord <WG2962> is willing. <WG2309> And <WG2532> I will know, <WG1097> not <WG3756> the word <WG3056> of those who <WG3588> are puffed up, <WG5448> but <WG235> the power. <WG1411>
For <WG1063> the Kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> is not <WG3756> in <WG1722> word, <WG3056> but <WG235> in <WG1722> power. <WG1411>

What <WG5101> do you <WG2309> want? <WG2064> Shall I come to <WG4314> you <WG5209> with <WG1722> a rod, <WG4464> or <WG2228> in <WG1722> love <WG26> and <WG5037> a spirit <WG4151> of gentleness? <WG4236>
